text: Horacio Rearte is a Tennis Coach. He has coached many top players, such as Jennifer Capriati, Nathalie Tauziat, Jean-Rene Lisnard, Alex Wozniak, Andy Roddick, Gilles Müller, getting to the quarterfinals of The US Open 2008, eventually losing to Roger Federer. Other great players that he coached, Sofia Kenin, ranked 52 WTA, Naomi Osaka, 2018 US Open Women Champion, ranked 5 WTA, Channelle Scheepers, Ryan Sweeting, Jesse Levine, and Adrian Mannarino, currently ranked 27 on the ATP tour (2017). He has also developed junior tennis players, such as British player, Oliver Golding , getting him to win the US Open 2011 Junior Championship. He has worked with many federation worldwide and been a consulting in many country worldwide. He was also the director and co-founder of ProWorld Tennis Academy. In the recent years, the USPTA has honored Horacio with the title of "Best Tour Coach," in 2009; "Player of the Year" and "Best Traveling Coach" in 2010. == References == == External links == * http://sports.espn.go.com/espn/print?id=3568072&type;=story * http://www.leparisien.fr/liveafp-sports/us-open-roger-federer-se-met-sur- son-31-et-gilles-muller-sera-de-la-fete-03-09-2008-193708.php * Gilles Müller * http://www.lessentiel.lu/sports/sports/story/20980424 * Jennifer Capriati * http://sports.espn.go.com/sports/tennis/columns/story?columnist=ubha_ravi&id;=3713248 * http://www.proworldtennis.com/#!home/mainPage Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Argentine tennis coaches
title: Horacio Rearte
